targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)) as time_from,
  TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)) as time_to,
  'Gestern' as button_text

SELECT
  TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)) as time_from,
  TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE()) as time_to,
  'Letzte Woche' as button_text

SELECT
  TIMESTAMP('${__from:date}') as time_from,
  TIMESTAMP('${__to:date}') as time_to,
  'Default Time Picker' as button_text

SELECT 
  TIMESTAMP(date), 
  SUM(m_visits) as m_visits 
  FROM Piano.total_visits
  WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" 
  AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen" 
  AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel" 
  AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" 
  AND $Zeitraum
  GROUP BY date

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(TIMESTAMP(date), INTERVAL $time_shift DAY), 
  SUM(m_visits) as m_visits
  FROM Piano.total_visits
  WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" 
  AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen" 
  AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel" 
  AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" 
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum
GROUP BY date

SELECT 
  TIMESTAMP(date), 
  SUM(m_visits) as m_visits
  FROM Piano.total_visits
  WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" 
  AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen" 
  AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel" 
  AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" 
  AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
  GROUP BY date

SELECT 
  --TIMESTAMP(date),
  DATE_ADD(TIMESTAMP(date), INTERVAL ${day_count:raw} DAY), 
  SUM(m_visits) as m_visits 
  FROM Piano.total_visits
  WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" 
  AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen" 
  AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel" 
  AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
  AND $VergleichszeitraumNew
GROUP BY date
  --AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date:iso}') AND DATE('${__to:date:iso}')

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Visits')), 'Visits')
FROM(
SELECT 'Visits' as Visits
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Bounce Rate in %')), 'Bounce Rate in %')
FROM(
SELECT 'Bounce Rate in %' as Bounce
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Page Views / Visits')), 'Page Views / Visits')
FROM(
SELECT 'Page Views / Visits' as pi_visits
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Time spent/Visit in s')), 'Time spent/Visit in s')
FROM(
SELECT 'Time spent/Visit in s' as Audio_Videostarts
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Audio- & Videostarts')), 'Audio- & Videostarts')
FROM(
SELECT 'Audio- & Videostarts' as Audio_Videostarts
)

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $Zeitraum

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $Vergleichszeitraum

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_bounce_rate*m_visits,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0))*100 as summe,
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $Zeitraum

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_bounce_rate*m_visits,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0))*100 as bounce_rate,
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $Vergleichszeitraum

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_page_loads,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,1)) as PI_per_visit,
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $Zeitraum

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_page_loads,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,1)) as PI_per_visit,
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $Vergleichszeitraum

SELECT
  SUM(m_visits * m_time_spent_per_visits/1000) / SUM(m_visits) AS time_spent
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $Zeitraum

SELECT 
  SUM(m_visits * m_time_spent_per_visits/1000) / SUM(m_visits) AS time_spent
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $Vergleichszeitraum

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND $Zeitraum

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND $Vergleichszeitraum

WITH past_value as(
SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as past_sum
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $Vergleichszeitraum), current_value AS (
SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as current_sum
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $Zeitraum
  )
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

AND $VergleichszeitraumNew

AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date:iso}') AND DATE('${__to:date:iso}')

  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe

  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND $VergleichszeitraumNew

WITH past_value as(
SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as past_sum
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $VergleichszeitraumNew), current_value AS (
SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as current_sum
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date:iso}') AND DATE('${__to:date:iso}')
  )
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

WITH nachrichten AS (
  SELECT 
  CASE page_chapter2 WHEN "thueringen" THEN "Thringen" WHEN "sachsen" THEN "Sachsen" WHEN "sachsen-anhalt" THEN "Sachsen-Anhalt" WHEN "deutschland" THEN "Deutschland" WHEN "welt" THEN "Welt" END as Chapter,
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
  FROM Piano.total_visits
  WHERE page_chapter1 = "nachrichten" AND page_chapter2 IN ("sachsen","sachsen-anhalt","thueringen","deutschland","welt") AND site_level2 = "$LRA" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND $Zeitraum
  GROUP BY Chapter
), ratgeber AS(
  SELECT 
  "Ratgeber" as Chapter,
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
  FROM Piano.total_visits
  WHERE page_chapter1 = "ratgeber" AND site_level2 = "$LRA" AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND $Zeitraum
  GROUP BY Chapter
--), app_aktuell AS (
--  SELECT
--  "App Aktuell" as Chapter,
--  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
--  FROM Piano.total_visits
--  WHERE page_chapter1 = "nachrichten" AND page_chapter2 IN ("app_aktuell","app-aktuell") AND site_level2 = "$LRA" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND $Zeitraum
), ndr_kapitel as (
  SELECT CASE page_chapter1 WHEN "nachrichten" THEN "Nachrichten" WHEN "kultur" THEN "Kultur" WHEN "sport" THEN "Sport" WHEN "geschichte" THEN "Geschichte" WHEN "ratgeber" THEN "Ratgeber" END as Chapter,
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
  FROM Piano.total_visits
  WHERE   site_level2 = "$LRA" AND page_chapter1 IN ("geschichte","kultur","nachrichten","ratgeber","sport") AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND $Zeitraum
  GROUP BY Chapter ), mdr as(
 SELECT * FROM(
SELECT
Chapter,
summe FROM nachrichten
UNION ALL
SELECT
Chapter,
summe FROM ratgeber
--UNION ALL 
--SELECT
--Chapter,
--summe FROM app_aktuell
))
SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN "$LRA" = "ndr.de" THEN ndr_kapitel.Chapter
WHEN "$LRA" = "mdr.de" THEN mdr.Chapter END as Chapter,
CASE WHEN "$LRA" = "ndr.de" THEN ndr_kapitel.summe
WHEN "$LRA" = "mdr.de" THEN mdr.summe END as summe FROM mdr,ndr_kapitel
ORDER BY summe desc

SELECT
publishing_date, 
content_titel,
sum(m_visits) as visits,
sum(m_page_loads) as page_views,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_bounce_rate*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS bounce_rate,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_homepage_anteil_visits*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS m_homepage_anteil_visits,
CASE 
  WHEN "$Redaktionen" = "Alle Kapitel 1"  THEN page_chapter1 
  WHEN "$Redaktionen" = "nachrichten"  THEN page_chapter2 
END AS Kapitel,
content_id_sophora, url
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE(publishing_date) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as publishing_date, 
FIRST_VALUE(content_id_sophora) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_id_sophora, 
page_chapter2, page_chapter1,
m_visits,
m_page_loads,
m_bounce_rate,
m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits,
m_homepage_anteil_visits, 
FIRST_VALUE(url) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as url, 
FIRST_VALUE(content_titel) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_titel, 
FROM 
Piano.articles_joined
WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(page_chapter1_tags) 
AND "$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%verteilseite%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%nachrichtenfeed%'
AND page_chapter1 NOT LIKE "CONT"
AND objekt_typ NOT LIKE 'indexPage'
AND $Zeitraum) 
GROUP BY content_id_sophora, content_titel, publishing_date, page_chapter2, page_chapter1, url, publishing_date ORDER BY 4 DESC 

LIMIT 100

SELECT
publishing_date, 
content_titel,
sum(m_visits) as visits,
sum(m_page_loads) as page_views,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_bounce_rate*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS bounce_rate,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_homepage_anteil_visits*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS m_homepage_anteil_visits,
CASE 
  WHEN "$Redaktionen" = "Alle Kapitel 1"  THEN page_chapter1 
  WHEN "$Redaktionen" = "nachrichten"  THEN page_chapter2 
END AS Kapitel,
content_id_sophora, url
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE(publishing_date) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as publishing_date, 
FIRST_VALUE(content_id_sophora) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_id_sophora, 
page_chapter2, page_chapter1,
m_visits,
m_page_loads,
m_bounce_rate,
m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits,
m_homepage_anteil_visits, 
FIRST_VALUE(url) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as url, 
FIRST_VALUE(content_titel) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_titel, 
FROM 
Piano.articles_joined
WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(page_chapter1_tags) 
AND "$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%verteilseite%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%nachrichtenfeed%'
AND page_chapter1 NOT LIKE "CONT"
AND objekt_typ NOT LIKE 'indexPage'
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')) 
GROUP BY content_id_sophora, content_titel, publishing_date, page_chapter2, page_chapter1, url, publishing_date ORDER BY 4 DESC 

LIMIT 100

SELECT  summe FROM
(
SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link
    ,0)) as summe
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
WHERE profileId = 26568
AND last_update = 
  (SELECT MAX(last_update) 
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
  WHERE profileId = 26568)
  AND $Zeitraum

)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Audio')), '')
FROM(
SELECT 'Audio' as Audio
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Wiedergaben')), 'Wiedergaben')
FROM(
SELECT 'Wiedergaben' as Wiedergaben
)

SELECT
SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) / SUM(m_av_playbacks) as summe
  --AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as summe
   -- AVG(m_av_playbacks)/AVG(av_content_duration) as summe
  --SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0))/SUM(COALESCE(av_content_duration,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND $Vergleichszeitraum 
AND av_content_type = "Audio"

WITH current_value AS (
  SELECT
  SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) / SUM(m_av_playbacks) as current_sum
  -- AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as current_sum
   -- AVG(m_av_playbacks)/AVG(av_content_duration) as summe
  --SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0))/SUM(COALESCE(av_content_duration,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND $Zeitraum
AND av_content_type = "Audio"
), past_value AS (
  SELECT
  SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) / SUM(m_av_playbacks) as past_sum
  --AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as past_sum
   -- AVG(m_av_playbacks)/AVG(av_content_duration) as summe
  --SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0))/SUM(COALESCE(av_content_duration,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND $Vergleichszeitraum 
AND av_content_type = "Audio"
)
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

  SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) / SUM(m_av_playbacks) as summe
FROM

WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND

AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND $Zeitraum
AND av_content_type = "Video"
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%Live%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%live%'

SELECT
  SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) / SUM(m_av_playbacks) as summe
  --AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as summe
  -- AVG(m_av_playbacks)/AVG(av_content_duration) as summe
  --SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0))/SUM(COALESCE(av_content_duration,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND $Vergleichszeitraum 
AND av_content_type = "Video"
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%Live%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%live%'

WITH current_value AS (
  SELECT
  SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) / SUM(m_av_playbacks) as current_sum
  -- AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as current_sum
   -- AVG(m_av_playbacks)/AVG(av_content_duration) as summe
  --SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0))/SUM(COALESCE(av_content_duration,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND $Zeitraum
AND av_content_type = "Video"
), past_value AS (
  SELECT
  SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) / SUM(m_av_playbacks) as past_sum
  --AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as past_sum
   -- AVG(m_av_playbacks)/AVG(av_content_duration) as summe
  --SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0))/SUM(COALESCE(av_content_duration,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND $Vergleichszeitraum 
AND av_content_type = "Video"
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%Live%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%live%'
)
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

SELECT 
  --AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as summe
  SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) / SUM(m_av_playbacks) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND $Zeitraum
AND av_content_type = "Audio"

SELECT 
bi_av_publication_date,
bi_av_content, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_url as url,
sum(m_av_playbacks) as wiedergabe,
CONCAT(CONCAT(

 CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String) END ,

 ":",CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String) END)," Min") as av_content_duration,
ROUND(AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate),4) wiedergaberate,
av_content_type,
bi_av_broadcasting_type,
--device_type,
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_publication_date) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_publication_date, 
m_av_playbacks,
CAST(av_content_duration/1000 AS INT) as av_content_duration,
m_av_average_playback_completion_rate,
av_content_type, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_broadcasting_type, 
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_url) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_url, 

--device_type,
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_content) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_content, 
FROM 
Piano.av
WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type = "ondemand"
AND $Zeitraum) GROUP BY bi_av_publication_date,bi_av_content,av_content_duration,av_content_type,bi_av_content_id, bi_av_broadcasting_type, bi_av_url
--,device_type 
ORDER BY 5 DESC
Limit 100

panels.title: Top 100 Web Audios & Videos on Demand

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
bi_av_publication_date,
bi_av_content, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_url as url,
sum(m_av_playbacks) as wiedergabe,
--CONCAT(CONCAT(

-- CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String) END ,

-- ":",CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String) END)," Min") as av_content_duration,
--AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) wiedergaberate,
av_content_type,
bi_av_broadcasting_type,
--device_type,
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_publication_date) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_publication_date, 

m_av_playbacks,
--CAST(av_content_duration/1000 AS INT) as av_content_duration,
--m_av_average_playback_completion_rate,
av_content_type, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_broadcasting_type, 
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_url) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_url, 
--device_type,
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_content) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_content, 
FROM 
Piano.av
WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type = "live"
AND $Zeitraum) GROUP BY bi_av_publication_date,bi_av_content,
--av_content_duration,
av_content_type,bi_av_content_id, bi_av_broadcasting_type, bi_av_url
--,device_type 
ORDER BY 5 DESC
Limit 100

SELECT 
  SUM(m_visits), 
  src_referrer_site_domain 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.distro` 
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $Zeitraum
AND src_referrer_site_domain NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND CASE WHEN 
      site_level2 = "mdr.de" 
      THEN (distribution = "web" OR distribution ="amp")
      ELSE 1=1 END 
GROUP BY src_referrer_site_domain 
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
  SUM(m_visits), 
  device_type 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.distro` 
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $Zeitraum
AND device_type NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND CASE WHEN 
      site_level2 = "mdr.de" 
      THEN (distribution = "web" OR distribution ="amp")
      ELSE 1=1 END 
GROUP BY device_type 
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
  SUM(m_visits), 
  src 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.distro` 
WHERE  
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND $Zeitraum
AND src NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND CASE WHEN 
      site_level2 = "mdr.de" 
      THEN (distribution = "web" OR distribution ="amp")
      ELSE 1=1 END 
GROUP BY src 
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT * 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.GoogleTrends.realtime_trends_clean` 
WHERE 
--  category ='Business'
  category = 'Headlines'
--  category = 'Science_Tech'

--  category = 'Entertainment'
--  category = 'Health'
AND tmstp =

ORDER BY rank

query.rawSql:
SELECT distinct media_house FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA"

SELECT distinct LRA FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
ORDER BY LRA ASC

SELECT distinct page_chapter1 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY page_chapter1 ASC

SELECT distinct page_chapter2 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA" AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2  NOT IN ("app-aktuell", "app_aktuell")
ORDER BY page_chapter2 ASC

SELECT distinct sendungs_id FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA" AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen" AND page_chapter2="$Unterkapitel"
ORDER BY sendungs_id ASC

current.text: date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
current.value: date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 8 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "date >= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY),INTERVAL 7 DAY) as saturday) AND date <= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL 7 DAY) as sunday)"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  60 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY)"
  END

SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "Gestern"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "Gestern vor 7 Tagen"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "Vorletztes Wochenende"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "Letzte 8-14 Tage"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "Letzte 31-60 Tage"
  END

current.value: date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()

list.name: Zeitraum

options.value: date >= (SELECTsaturdayFROM(SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) as saturday)) AND date <= (SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) as sunday)
date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()
date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()

list.query: Heute : date = CURRENT_DATE(), Gestern : date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  1 DAY), Letztes Wochenende : date >= (SELECTsaturdayFROM(SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\,WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) as saturday)) AND date <= (SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\,WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) as sunday), Letzte 7 Tage : date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE(), Letzte 30 Tage : date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()

query.rawSql:
SELECT
CASE
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN 1
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN 7
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letztes Wochenende" THEN 7
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN 7
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN 30 END

--SELECT date_diff(DATE('${__to:date:iso}'), DATE('${__from:date:iso}'), DAY) AS day_count
--CASE day_count = 0
--  1 
--END
SELECT
CASE
    WHEN date_diff(DATE('${__to:date:iso}'), DATE('${__from:date:iso}'), DAY) = 0 THEN 1
    ELSE date_diff(DATE('${__to:date:iso}'), DATE('${__from:date:iso}'), DAY)
END;

current.text: date >= DATE_SUB(DATE('2023-07-20T07:25:30.248Z'), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND date <= DATE_SUB(DATE('2023-07-27T07:25:30.248Z'), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
current.value: date >= DATE_SUB(DATE('2023-07-20T07:25:30.248Z'), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND date <= DATE_SUB(DATE('2023-07-27T07:25:30.248Z'), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

query.rawSql:
--SELECT "date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)"
SELECT "date >= DATE_SUB(DATE('${__from:date}'), INTERVAL ${day_count:raw} DAY) AND date <= DATE_SUB(DATE('${__to:date}'), INTERVAL ${day_count:raw} DAY)"


--SELECT "date >=  DATE_SUB(${__from:date:iso}, INTERVAL  60 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY)"

--"date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)"

--date_diff(DATE('${__to:date:iso}'), DATE('${__from:date:iso}'), DAY)
--  CASE "${day_count:raw}"
--  WHEN "Heute" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)"
--  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 8 DAY)"

list.name: ZeitraumNew
list.query: Immer : date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date:iso}') AND DATE('${__to:date:iso}'), Test : XX
